definition: foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common

sentences.english: The acids in tomato juice can degrade the drink’s other ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 番茄汁中的酸會削弱其他材料帶來的味覺。

sentences.english: Penne Pasta, Zucchini, Bacon, Tomato Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 意式筆尖面，節瓜，培根，番茄汁。

sentences.english: Dont spill tomato sauce on your clothes; its very hard to remove.
sentences.chinese: 不要把番茄汁翻在衣服上，它很難洗掉。

sentences.english: Squeeze tomatoes through sieve into bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把番茄末放筲萁中過濾成番茄汁。

sentences.english: And if you drink tomato juice regularly, your skin will be more healthy and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 此外，常飲番茄汁可使皮膚健美。

sentences.english: He notes the company is now exploring a tomato-juice production line.
sentences.chinese: 他指出該公司目前正在建設一條番茄汁生產線。

definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
